item.title: Interview – Atomfall’s art director on Windscale, druids & government cover ups
item.content:encoded:
https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/03/07/interview-atomfalls-art-director-on-windscale-druids-government-cover-ups/

Rebellion’s Atomfall is set to whisk players back to the early 1960s later this month, creating an alternate universe following the Windscale nuclear disaster in the North of England, letting you explore a locked down version of the Lake District that’s filled with strange mysteries, druids, military police and plenty more.

We’ve been hands on with the game ahead of its release on 27th March – read our Atomfall preview here – but also had the chance to sit down with Ryan Greene, art director on the game, to chat about some of the inspirations, the world that they’ve created and more!

Thanks a lot to Ryan for chatting with us. Make sure to check out our preview, and keep your eyes peeled around the end of the month and our review of the game!
